column2: 醒来发现自己深陷迷局
column5: Stuck solving a puzzle with no clues
column6: 像是试着解开没有线索的谜题
column10: 我的每一个梦想变成现实
column11: But it all means so little without you
column12: 但是没有你 这些成就又如何
column13: I'd never say these words to anyone else
column14: 我从来没有对别人说过这些话
column15: I always play a part with everyone else
column16: 我总是配合别人的那一个
column17: Been wasting too much time not being myself
column18: 浪费了好多时间 伪装自己
column21: 但在你身边 我不再假装
column22: Drank some wine to finally confess
column23: 喝醉之后 我终于坦诚
column24: That there's a wounded heart inside of my chest
column25: 我的胸膛里有一颗伤痕累累的心
column26: And now I want you back
column27: cuz I feel like a mess
column28: 我想要你回到我身边 因为我感觉自己一团糟
column29: But with you I stop pretending
column30: 当你在我身边 我做回自己
column33: Of how you used to say my name
column35: But I'm stuck in the shadow of my pain
